skill.s1.name: Summer Gift Basket
skill.s1.description: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of Minami's [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color].
Then inflict [color=#fc8a9a][b][Candied][/b][/color] on them for 3 turns.

[color=#fc8a9a][b][Candied][/b][/color]: When any ally attacks a Candied foe, increase [color=#ffffa4][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] (Increase [color=#ffffa4][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]4%[/b][/color] more for every [color=#ffffa4][b]1200[/b][/color] of Minami's [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color], up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color]).
skill.s2.name: Midsummer Flower Field
skill.s2.description: Increase party's [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 3 turns (Increase [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]3.2%[/b][/color] more for every [color=#ffffa4][b]1200[/b][/color] of Minami's [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color], up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color]).
Grant party 1 [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Blessing[/i][/b][/color] stack, and cure 1 debuff.
skill.s3.name: Faraway Flower
skill.s3.description: Increase 1 other ally's [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]33.33%[/b][/color] of Minami's [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG[/b][/color] that is over by [color=#ffffa4][b]100%[/b][/color], up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Crit DMG[/b][/color].

During this effect, when Minami uses an item on that ally, additionally increase their [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]16.66%[/b][/color] of Minami's [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG[/b][/color] that is over by [color=#ffffa4][b]100%[/b][/color], up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Crit DMG[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Increase 1 other ally's [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]16.66%[/b][/color] of Minami's [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG[/b][/color] that is over [color=#ffffa4][b]100%[/b][/color], up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Crit DMG[/b][/color].
When Minami uses the next item, increase [color=#ffffa4][b]Item Effect[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.p1.name: Pray
skill.p1.description: When using a Persona skill on allies, grant them 1 [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Blessing[/i][/b][/color] stack.

When Minami is on the field, increase allies' [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for each [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Blessing[/i][/b][/color] stack they have, up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.p2.name: Care
skill.p2.description: When Minami is on the field, increase allies' [color=#ffffa4][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
Increase [color=#ffffa4][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] more for each Buff Item effect on allies.
awareness.a0.name: Stopping Time for You
awareness.a0.description: Minami has 3 unlimited Exclusive Buff Items only she can use.
When using [ref=s3][color=#bc7958][b][u][Faraway Flower][/u][/b][/color][/ref], gain 1 [color=#e34657][b][Flower of Dream][/b][/color] stack.
At the start of Minami's turn, she can spend 1 [color=#e34657][b][Flower of Dream][/b][/color] to gain [color=#e9924b][b][Memory Prescription][/b][/color].
[color=#e9924b][b][Memory Prescription][/b][/color]: Can use item without spending an action, extend Buff Item effect by 1 turn, lose this effect after using 1 item.
awareness.a1.name: Past Memories
awareness.a1.description: When using [ref=s3][color=#bc7958][b][u][Faraway Flower][/u][/b][/color][/ref], gain 1 [color=#e34657][b][Flower of Dream][/b][/color] more.
Increase the maximum number of [color=#e34657][b][Flower of Dream][/b][/color] stacks to 2.
awareness.a2.name: Wind-Blown Flower
awareness.a2.description: When using [ref=s1][color=#bc7958][b][u][Summer Gift Basket][/u][/b][/color][/ref], inflict targets with [color=#fadf98][b][Flower's Embrace][/b][/color]

[color=#fadf98][b][Flower's Embrace][/b][/color]: Decrease [color=#ffffa4][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]25%[/b][/color] and increase [color=#ffffa4][b]Crit DMG Taken[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]30%[/b][/color] for 3 turns.
awareness.a3.name: Blooming Under the Sun
awareness.a3.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s1][color=#bc7958][b][u][Summer Gift Basket][/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s3][color=#bc7958][b][u][Faraway Flower][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3
awareness.a4.name: The Person Now
awareness.a4.description: Extend all buffs from [ref=hl][color=#bc7958][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3 turn.
When using the next item, increase [color=#ffffa4][b]Item Effect[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]5%[/b][/color] more.
awareness.a5.name: As Gentle as Ever
awareness.a5.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s2][color=#bc7958][b][u][Midsummer Flower Field][/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=hl][color=#bc7958][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a6.name: Hiding Untold Secrets
awareness.a6.description: Minami no longer spends items when using any items.
Extend all Buff Item effect by 1 turn.
When Minami has [color=#e9924b][b][Memory Prescription][/b][/color] and uses an item on allies, grant the main target [color=#6caee0][b][Revitalization Boost][/b][/color]
[color=#6caee0][b][Revitalization Boost][/b][/color]: Increase [color=#ffffa4][b]Total DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]15%[/b][/color] for 1 turns.
